Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary South-bound Reroute near 74th/Exchange
ShortDescription: Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 73rd, Exchange, Yates, 75th, Exchange, due to street blockage near 74th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 73rd, Exchange, Yates, 75th, Exchange, and resume normal, due to street blockage near 74th/Exchange.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
